mapper.sql: deviceId, deviceFactory, deviceType, deviceModel, protocol, netPort, broadPort, startBit, stopBit, dataBit, parityBit, interfaceType, baudRate, beid
mapper.insert: insert into bas_pacu_device_specification (deviceId, deviceFactory, deviceType, deviceModel, protocol, netPort, broadPort, startBit, stopBit, dataBit, parityBit, interfaceType, baudRate, beid) values (#{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceFactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{protocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{broadPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startBit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stopBit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataBit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parityBit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baudRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into bas_pacu_device_specification
deviceId,
deviceFactory,
deviceType,
deviceModel,
protocol,
netPort,
broadPort,
startBit,
stopBit,
dataBit,
parityBit,
interfaceType,
baudRate,
beid,

#{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update bas_pacu_device_specification
deviceFactory = #{deviceFactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deviceType = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deviceModel = #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
protocol = #{protocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
netPort = #{netPort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
broadPort = #{broadPort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
startBit = #{startBit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stopBit = #{stopBit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dataBit = #{dataBit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parityBit = #{parityBit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
interfaceType = #{interfaceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
baudRate = #{baudRate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bas_pacu_device_specification set deviceFactory = #{deviceFactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deviceType = #{deviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deviceModel = #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, protocol = #{protocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, netPort = #{netPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, broadPort = #{broadPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, startBit = #{startBit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stopBit = #{stopBit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dataBit = #{dataBit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parityBit = #{parityBit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interfaceType = #{interfaceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, baudRate = #{baudRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT deviceId, deviceFactory, deviceType, deviceModel, protocol, netPort, broadPort, startbit, stopbit, databit, paritybit, interfaceType, CASE interfaceType WHEN 1 THEN '网口' WHEN 2 THEN '串口' WHEN 3 THEN 'UDP' END AS interfaceName , baudRate , (SELECT codeName FROM bas_sys_code WHERE groupId = 'device_type' AND codeValue = a.deviceType AND beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) deviceName FROM bas_pacu_device_specification a where beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
